name: Lucario
flavorText:
It has the ability to sense the
auras of all things.
It understands human speech.

previous.name: Riolu
previous.flavorText:
The aura that emanates from its
body intensifies to alert others
if it is afraid or sad.

next.name: Hippopotas
next.flavorText:
It lives in arid places. Instead
of perspiration, it expels grainy
sand from its body.
